title: Admin creates a new user account with a primary role
description: As an Admin, I want to create a new user account by providing their name, email, and assigning a primary role, so that I can securely grant a new employee the appropriate level of system access to perform their job duties.
sprint_goal: Establish foundational system: User roles, RBAC, core master data models, and user login.
acceptance_criteria: Successful user creation; Error on duplicate email; Validation on required fields.
definition_of_done: All ACs pass; Code reviewed; Unit tests >80%; Security access validated; Deployed to staging.
business_value: Enables secure and controlled onboarding of new employees by provisioning role-based access to the system.

title: System Enforces Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) for All Data Models
description: As a System Administrator, I want the system to strictly enforce data access and modification rights based on a user's assigned role, so that sensitive company data is protected, operational integrity is maintained, and each user can only perform actions relevant to their job function.
sprint_goal: Establish foundational system: User roles, RBAC, core master data models, and user login.
acceptance_criteria: Admin has full CRUD; Dispatch Manager restricted from finance; Driver can only see own trips; Driver cannot see financial data.
definition_of_done: All ACs pass for all roles; Security files implemented and reviewed; E2E tests for key restrictions pass; Deployed to staging.
business_value: Ensures data security and confidentiality, enforces the principle of least privilege.

title: Admin creates a new vehicle record
description: As an Admin, I want to create a new vehicle record by entering its key details like truck number, model, capacity, and ownership status.
sprint_goal: Establish foundational system: User roles, RBAC, core master data models, and user login.
acceptance_criteria: Successful creation with valid data; Error on duplicate truck number; Validation for required fields.
definition_of_done: All ACs pass; Code reviewed; Unit tests >80%; E2E tests pass; Deployed to staging.
business_value: Establishes the foundational master data for the vehicle fleet.

title: Dispatch Manager creates a new trip
description: As a Dispatch Manager, I want to create a new trip record by selecting a customer, defining the route, and specifying the material details and rate.
sprint_goal: Complete Master Data Management (Edit, Deactivate) and implement core Trip Creation workflow.
acceptance_criteria: Successful trip creation; Error on missing mandatory fields; Customer selection only shows active customers.
definition_of_done: All ACs pass; Code reviewed; Unit tests >80%; E2E tests pass; Deployed to staging.
business_value: Initiates the primary revenue-generating workflow of the system.

title: Dispatch Manager assigns an available vehicle and driver to a trip
description: As a Dispatch Manager, I want to select an available vehicle and an available driver from filtered lists and assign them to a 'Planned' trip.
sprint_goal: Implement Trip Assignment workflow with all compliance validations and add document management.
acceptance_criteria: Successful assignment changes status to 'Assigned'; Vehicle list is filtered by status; Driver list is filtered by status and license validity; Error on insufficient vehicle capacity.
definition_of_done: All ACs pass; Code reviewed; Unit tests >80%; Integration tests pass; Deployed to staging.
deployment_notes: Implements core business rules on trip assignment.
business_value: Enables the transition of a trip from planning to execution and ensures compliant resource allocation.

title: Driver logs into the mobile-friendly web portal
description: As a Driver, I want to securely log into a simple, mobile-friendly web portal using my credentials, so that I can access my assigned trips and update my status.
sprint_goal: Deliver Driver Portal MVP: Login, view assigned trips, start a trip, log events, and upload POD.
acceptance_criteria: Successful login redirects to driver dashboard; Error on invalid credentials; UI is responsive on 360px width.
definition_of_done: All ACs pass; Code reviewed; E2E tests pass; Security & accessibility scans pass; Deployed to staging.
deployment_notes: Creates the entry point for all driver functionality.
business_value: Enables drivers to access the system, which is the primary entry point for all field-based data capture.

title: Driver submits a trip-related expense with receipt
description: As a Driver, I want to submit a trip-related expense through my mobile web portal by selecting the expense type, entering the amount, and uploading a photo of the receipt.
sprint_goal: Implement the complete Expense Submission and Approval workflow, and add core Trip Exception Handling.
acceptance_criteria: Successful submission creates 'Submitted' expense; Validation on required fields; Error on invalid file type/size.
definition_of_done: All ACs pass; Code reviewed; Unit & Integration tests pass; Performance on throttled network verified; Deployed to staging.
business_value: Enables accurate and timely tracking of trip-related expenditures.

title: Finance Officer creates a pre-filled draft invoice from a completed trip
description: As a Finance Officer, I want to automatically generate a pre-filled invoice from a completed trip record, so that I can reduce manual data entry and speed up billing.
sprint_goal: Solidify financial calculations and prepare for invoicing.
acceptance_criteria: Button on 'Completed' trip creates a 'Draft' invoice; Invoice is pre-filled with customer, rate, and trip details; Button is hidden for non-completed or already-invoiced trips.
definition_of_done: All ACs pass; Code reviewed; Unit tests >80%; Deployed to staging.
deployment_notes: Key enabler for the main invoicing story.

title: Finance Officer generates a GST-compliant e-invoice for a completed trip
description: As a Finance Officer, I want to generate a GST-compliant e-invoice for a completed trip to bill the customer accurately and comply with government tax regulations.
sprint_goal: CRITICAL: Implement end-to-end GST E-Invoicing integration, including GSP client, workflow, and failure handling.
acceptance_criteria: Successful generation via GSP API updates status and PDF; Error on non-completed trips; Resilient handling of API failures (sync/async fallback).
definition_of_done: All ACs pass in GSP sandbox; Code reviewed; Unit/Integration tests pass; PDF is compliant; Security review complete; Deployed to staging.
business_value: Ensures compliance with Indian GST e-invoicing laws and automates billing.

title: Finance Officer records a payment against an invoice
description: As a Finance Officer, I want to record partial or full payments received from a customer against a specific invoice to track accounts receivable.
sprint_goal: Complete core financial loop with payment recording, ledgers, notifications, and card management.
acceptance_criteria: Full payment marks invoice as 'Paid'; Partial payment updates 'Amount Due'; No payment on 'Paid' invoices.
definition_of_done: All ACs pass; Code reviewed; Role-based access verified; Deployed to staging.
business_value: Enables accurate tracking of accounts receivable and cash flow.

title: Manager views the main dashboard with operational and financial KPIs
description: As a Manager, I want to view a real-time, consolidated dashboard with key operational and financial widgets to quickly assess the health of the business.
sprint_goal: Surface data via dashboards and alerts, and configure notifications.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard loads and widgets display correct data; Clicking widgets navigates to filtered lists; Unauthorized users are denied access.
definition_of_done: All ACs pass; Code reviewed; Unit tests for KPI logic >80%; Performance (LCP < 3s) verified; Deployed to staging.
collaboration_required: Backend team for data aggregation queries.
business_value: Provides an at-a-glance overview of business health for faster decision-making.

title: Dispatch Manager generates and exports operational reports
description: As a Dispatch Manager, I want to access, filter, and export key operational reports to analyze performance and improve logistics.
sprint_goal: Deliver core operational and financial reporting suites with export functionality.
acceptance_criteria: Can generate Trip, Vehicle Utilization, Driver Performance, and Trip Interruption reports; Filtering works; Export to Excel/PDF works.
definition_of_done: All ACs pass; Code reviewed; Unit tests for data aggregation >80%; Performance NFRs met; Deployed to staging.
deployment_notes: Performance of queries with large datasets is critical.
business_value: Enables data-driven decision-making to improve operational efficiency and reduce costs.

title: Manager generates a Vehicle Profitability Report
description: As a Manager, I want to generate a Vehicle Profitability Report that aggregates total revenue and total expenses for each vehicle over a specific period.
sprint_goal: Deliver advanced analytical reports and add driver self-service features.
acceptance_criteria: Accurate revenue calculation (from completed trips); Accurate expense calculation (approved trip and non-trip costs); Handles vehicles with only expenses.
definition_of_done: All ACs pass; Code reviewed; Unit tests >80%; Performance NFRs met; Deployed to staging.
deployment_notes: Database query optimization is key for this report.
business_value: Enables data-driven asset management by providing clear financial performance indicators for each vehicle.

title: Implement Continuous Integration (CI) Pipeline
description: Create a GitHub Actions workflow that triggers on pull requests. The workflow must run linters, execute Pytest, and enforce the 80% code coverage gate.
sprint_goal: Establish CI/CD foundation: Containerize applications and build the CI pipeline for automated quality checks.
acceptance_criteria: CI workflow triggers on PR; Linters and formatters run and fail build on error; Pytest runs and fails build on test failure; Coverage gate enforces 80% threshold.
definition_of_done: CI pipeline is active on the main repo; All checks are functional; Documentation in CONTRIBUTING.md is complete.
collaboration_required: Development team to ensure local checks match CI.
business_value: Automates code quality checks, preventing bugs and increasing software quality.

title: Terraform for AWS EKS Cluster
description: Create Terraform modules to provision a high-availability Amazon EKS cluster, including node groups, VPC, subnets, and security groups.
sprint_goal: Provision core AWS infrastructure using Terraform, focusing on the EKS cluster and managed services.
acceptance_criteria: Terraform successfully provisions HA VPC; EKS control plane is created; Managed node groups join the cluster; Core add-ons (ALB controller, EBS CSI) are installed.
definition_of_done: `terraform apply` runs successfully; `kubectl` can connect and manage the cluster; A sample app can be deployed using a LoadBalancer and PersistentVolumeClaim.
collaboration_required: Security team for IAM role review.
business_value: Provides the core container orchestration platform for running the application in a scalable and resilient manner.

title: Admin executes a one-time data migration from the legacy system
description: As an Admin, I want to execute a well-defined process with supporting scripts to migrate key master data and open financial transactions from our legacy system into the new TMS.
sprint_goal: Finalize system for Go-Live: Implement security hardening, audit trails, data migration, and user training materials.
acceptance_criteria: Successful migration of active customers, all vehicles, active drivers, and open invoices; Idempotent scripts prevent duplicates on re-run.
definition_of_done: All ACs pass in staging; Scripts are code-reviewed; Full dry-run in staging is approved; Production runbook is created and peer-reviewed.
deployment_notes: Critical for business continuity at go-live.
business_value: Enables business continuity by populating the new TMS with critical operational data before go-live.
